mapper.sql: id, keywords_content, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from s_keywords where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.delete: delete from s_keywords where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into s_keywords (id, keywords_content, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{keywordsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into s_keywords
id,
keywords_content,
ins_id,
ins_ymdhms,
upd_id,
upd_ymdhms,
upd_eac,
del_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{keywordsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update s_keywords
keywords_content = #{keywordsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)

update s_keywords set keywords_content = #{keywordsContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)
mapper.select:
SELECT id AS id, keywords_content AS keywordsContent,ins_ymdhms as insYmdhms FROM s_keywords
and keywords_content like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keywordsContent}),'%')
AND del_flag='0' order by ins_ymdhms desc
LIMIT #{startPage}, #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM s_keywords
and keywords_content like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keywordsContent}),'%')
and del_flag='0'
